mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voucher (voucher_date, company_code, status) VALUES (#{voucherDate}, #{companyCode}, #{status})
INSERT INTO voucher_account (voucher_id, account_code, debit_amount, credit_amount) VALUES (#{voucherId}, #{accountCode}, #{debitAmount}, #{creditAmount})
INSERT INTO voucher_evidence (voucher_id, file_name, file_path, upload_time) VALUES (#{voucherId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{uploadTime})
